name: LowPoly Horizon 3
description:
Third game in the series. I remade it from scratch.

Controls

Arrow keys/WASD - Drive/Fly

Space - Handbrake 

Left Shift - Boost

1,2 - Lights 

Q,E - Open/Close parking gates

On the main menu you can explore the environment by,

Dragging with the right mouse button.

W, A, S, D, Q, E.

((Ctrl  -) if the game is zoomed in or doesn't fit the screen )
